name: Rab Elevation Pants - Women's
description: Get unrestricted mobility for cragging or fast-paced hikes. This versatile style is cut high in the waist, slim through the leg and uses reliable soft shell material.Matrix double-weave soft shell fabric has 4-way stretch.Light DWR coating sheds rain and grime.Elastic waist with drawcord.High waist sits comfortably under a backpack or a climbing harness.1 zippered thigh pocket.Slim athletic fit.
